## Welcome to our Academy

The chen.ist Academy is a comprehensive educational initiative dedicated to advancing technical knowledge, fostering innovation, and building a community of skilled professionals. Through our diverse range of courses, events, and projects, we aim to provide practical, hands-on learning experiences that prepare participants for the challenges of modern technology environments.

## Learning Paths

Our academy offers structured learning paths designed to guide your educational journey based on your interests, goals, and current skill level.

```{=html}
<div class="row mt-5">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Cybersecurity Track</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>A comprehensive learning path for those interested in building careers in cybersecurity, from foundational concepts to specialized areas.</p>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Courses:</strong> Practical Cybersecurity, Human Firewall, Data Protection</li>
          <li><strong>Trainings:</strong> Cybersecurity Essentials, Security Awareness for Teams</li>
          <li><strong>Microlearning:</strong> QubesOS, OpenBSD Security</li>
          <li><strong>Events:</strong> Cybersecurity Hackathon, Security Workshops</li>
          <li><strong>Projects:</strong> Vulnerability Assessment, Security Tool Development</li>
        </ul>
        <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">View Path Details</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Open Source Development Track</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>For developers looking to enhance their skills through contribution to open source projects and collaboration with the community.</p>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Courses:</strong> Open Source Development, Unix/Linux Systems</li>
          <li><strong>Trainings:</strong> Open Source Contribution Workshop, Linux Admin Fundamentals</li>
          <li><strong>Microlearning:</strong> CLI Intro, Tmux, NixOS</li>
          <li><strong>Events:</strong> Computer Club Meetups, Coding Workshops</li>
          <li><strong>Projects:</strong> Open Source Contributions, Tool Development</li>
        </ul>
        <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">View Path Details</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Innovation & Maker Track</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>Designed for creators and innovators interested in hardware, IoT, and physical computing projects.</p>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Courses:</strong> Hardware Fundamentals, IoT Security</li>
          <li><strong>Microlearning:</strong> Syncthing, Quarto</li>
          <li><strong>Events:</strong> Makers Workshop, Space Hackathon</li>
          <li><strong>Projects:</strong> IoT Prototyping, Hardware Development</li>
        </ul>
        <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">View Path Details</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="col-md-6">
    <div class="card mb-4">
      <div class="card-header bg-success text-white">
        <h3 class="card-title mb-0">Data Privacy & Compliance Track</h3>
      </div>
      <div class="card-body">
        <p>For professionals focused on data protection, privacy regulations, and implementing compliant systems.</p>
        <ul>
          <li><strong>Courses:</strong> Data Protection and Privacy, Security Awareness</li>
          <li><strong>Trainings:</strong> Data Privacy Compliance Workshop</li>
          <li><strong>Microlearning:</strong> LaTeX, Org-mode</li>
          <li><strong>Events:</strong> Privacy Workshops, Compliance Seminars</li>
          <li><strong>Projects:</strong> Privacy Impact Assessments, GDPR Compliance</li>
        </ul>
        <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">View Path Details</a>
```
